State.Description: 4 Male Half-Orc head presets

State.Author: Trips
State.Description: Re-releases old shader files to get around those pesky VT's. Modder's Resource and dependency for mods.

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod expands the colorful skintone selection by adding lighter and darker shades to Vanilla skintones, as well as a variety of new options. This version focuses on Fantasy skintones.
State.Name: Astralities' Fantasy Skintone Expansion

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Adds more contextual info to Target Info panel (resistances/vulnerabilities, item value, number of items in containers etc).

Original.Name: Companions Panel and Camp Chest Everywhere-4968-1-2-3-1725606224.zip

State.Description: Improves Companions Panel, makes it (and Camp Chest) available from anywhere.

State.Description: Disables the combat log for Silvanus Blessing, so that you are not spammed with Log Notifications anymore

State.Description: 11 new heads for character creation menu, available to Elf, Human and Tiefling races

State.Author: Siael
State.Description: Complete rework of Illithid Powers
State.Name: Illithid Powers Overhaul 2

State.Author: Aetherpoint
State.Description: This mod enables the unused glowmap Larian Studios created for Karlach's horns. Making the script on her horns glow, and pulse at the same rate as her heart.

Original.Name: Mod Manager Fixes and Tweaks (No PTSD Warnings)-11954-1-2-8-1725781709.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Fixes small bugs and inconsistencies in mod manager menu. Version with tweaks additionally improves mod preview and mod list windows - both are more tight now, with more mods in the screen.
State.Name: Mod Manager Fixes and Tweaks

Original.Name: No Press Any Key Menu for MCM-745-1-7-6-1725805506.zip

State.Description: No "Press Any Key to continue" stop to Main menu.

State.Author: AkELkA
State.Description:
NON-REPLACER. 

Adds new head, crest top, chin, jaw, tail, and for male Dragonborn

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: A variety of piercing mashups available as new sets or replacers. Compatibility with Trips' Accessories and Magic Mirror. Includes guide for DIY.
State.Name: Piercing Edits

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new, more understated eye colors to the game, with and without subtle glow.
State.Name: Understated - Eye Color Collection

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Magical healing potions that look for any available healing potion of the same type in the party's inventory for convenience, no more splitting potion or looking for them inside 50 bags



May activate your 5G chip.
State.Name: Wifi potions v2 tm

State.Author: boring3
State.Description:
Elevate the CPU Priority of the game process.

Improve overall performance and Prevent stutters caused by other processes.
State.Name: Baldur's Priority - CPU Performance FPS Optimizer

State.Author: chazwarp923
State.Description: A Mod Organizer 2 plugin that adds basic support for Baldur's Gate 3.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 - Mod Organizer 2 Plugin

State.Author: Hein84
State.Description:
-improved landscapes with no performance loss

-works with Vulkan AND DirectX
State.Name: Vivid Landscapes - HD Ground and Terrain Textures with zero performance loss

State.Author: Hein84
State.Description: ash, smoke, fire and glow effects in 1k/2k/4k resolution
State.Name: Vivid Landscapes - Fire and Ashes

State.Author: Hein84
State.Description: improved roads in 1k/2k/4k/Best Performance
State.Name: Vivid Landscapes - Roads - 1k-2k-4k-Best Performance

State.Author: Hein84
State.Description:
Improved Water in 2k, 4k or Best Performance

- 2k comes with zero performance loss

- Best Performance actually improves it
State.Name: Vivid Landscapes - Water - 2k-4k-Best Performance

State.Author: Cross67
State.Description: Creates Passives that give Action Resources (Rage Charges, Ki Points, Wild Shape Charges, etc.) when applied.  This mod does nothing on its own and is intended to be used for advanced configuration of Combat Extender (though CX is not required).
State.Name: Action Resource Passives

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod enables glowing eyes for races without them - Humans, Elves, Drow, Half-Elves, Half-Orcs, Halflings, Dwarves, Gnomes & Githyanki, as well as modded races.
State.Name: Astralities' Glow Eyes

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description:
Automatically initiate lockpicking when interacting with locked chests and doors if you don't have the key. 

Configurable through a JSON file.
State.Name: Auto Lockpicking

State.Author: Zehtuka
State.Description: This mod enhances enemy abilities, spells, and buffs with easy user configuration. It allows you to adjust combat difficulty and modify it to your specific needs as a player.
State.Name: Combat Extender

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Another pack of 8 hair mashups combining vanilla hairs. For all body types.
State.Name: Em's Hair Mashups Pack 3

Original.Name: Fantastical Stylist - Dreadlocks and Curly Styles-5146-2-0-1718867740.zip

State.Author: Dungeons And Souls
State.Description: This page hosts CC Patches for Fantastical Multiverse.  If you're looking for a patch for a beautiful hair or face you'll likely find it here! Give your Tav the makeover they deserve!
State.Name: Fantastical Stylist

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically helps companions who get stuck or fall behind due to broken pathfinding by teleporting them or briefly boosting their jumps. 'Teleport Party To You', but autonomous.
State.Name: Fix Stragglers

State.Author: AlanaSP ShinyHobo Djmr and Zee
State.Description: Changes existing UI to enhance the current modding scene by removing intrusive in-game warning and enhancing character creation options. Also provides optional files that replace UI elements based on player feedback
State.Name: ImprovedUI ReleaseReady

State.Author: Koralina
State.Description: Adds 3 heads with icons to the character creation menu
State.Name: Koralina's Aesthetics - Head Collection

State.Author: Padme4000
State.Description: This mod page is for hosting my mod that so far patches for anything that needs to be added to the races.lsx file as sadly that file is very incompatible with other mods that edit the same sections. So this makes them compatible if I got permission to add them.
State.Name: Patches for CC Mods (Races Hairs Heads Cosmetic and such)

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Reduces repetitive NPC banter by introducing delays before they repeat. Fully configurable through MCM.
State.Name: Reduce NPC Banter Repetitiveness

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: 8 Female Githyanki Head Presets (lore friendly).
State.Name: VLAAKITH'S CHOSEN Head Presets by cedastarions

State.Author: bububull
State.Description: adds 3 variations of a long, a bit disheveled hairstyle for all races and body types
State.Name: Bardic hairstyles

State.Author: Caites and juumeijin
State.Description: Adds new information to tooltips and makes tooltips more readable. Also sort of framework for Artifact rarity.
State.Name: Better Tooltips

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: This is the Compatibility Framework. Split off from BG3 Community Library, this mod provides an API for other mods to use improve compatibility. Initially designed for Subclass Compatibility, the Framework has API endpoints that Script-Extender Enabled mods can hook into to insert values into Progressions, Feats, and Lists at Runtime.
State.Name: Compatibility Framework

State.Author: fasterdisasters
State.Description: A collection of 23 reusable new dyes and dye remover with custom icons.
State.Name: Disastrous Dyes

State.Author: Mithras666
State.Description: Fully modular, easy to configure Autosave mod. Triggers Autosaves on the chosen events, such as "Combat Started", "Entered Camp".
State.Name: Event Autosave - MCM

State.Author: Ghouls0Rules
State.Description: An assortment of custom piercings all in one place!

Original.Name: IWT - For Better Hotbar 2 - Hide Looted-5342-1-3-1709148064.zip

State.Author: Proxa Djmr and Zee
State.Description: Enhances visual feedback and improves ease of use when using the "Show all items" in-game functionality. Official combination of 2 previous mods "Enhanced World Tooltips" and "ImprovedUI Showallitems"
State.Name: Improved World Tooltips

State.Author: CilantroRosie
State.Description:
A pack of hairs that I found myself using over and over and over again.  (btw Kirby is one of my dogs.  He has personally chosen all the hairs that made it into this pack, and is currently working on his next selections)



PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF ANYTHING IS BROKEN
State.Name: Kirby's Hair Pack

State.Author: MisfitOnyx
State.Description: Some new glowy eye colors for Character Creation
State.Name: Onyx Eye Collection

State.Author: Korakys
State.Description: Changes all ability granting items to give relative increases rather than fixed values, e.g. Gloves of Dexterity gives +4 Dex instead of 18 Dex.
State.Name: Relative Ability Boost Items

State.Author: Zarnos
State.Description: This mod prevents other versions of Bless from overwriting Sweet Stone Features (the buff from purchasing a statue of yourself). Most other ways of obtaining Bless only last a few turns so it makes no sense that the would overwrite Sweet Stone Features which is supposed to be permanent.
State.Name: StatueBlessFix

State.Author: Lethze
State.Description: Give certain NPCs unique appearances.

1 for body 1 tielfing

State.Name: Disable combat log for Crusader's Mantle

State.Author: Armarui
State.Description: Selecting the Wildheart subclass now grants you access to each Bestial Heart. You can attune to a different animal each time you Rage, and you can change Bestial Hearts while raging as a bonus action without expending an additional Rage Charge.
State.Name: Dynamic Wildheart Barbarian

State.Author: cetriolo
State.Description:
An absolute fraud in a very nice coat — and not-so-nice boots. 

A simple edit to make Tyrannical Jackboots match the rest of Gortash's outfit.
State.Name: Gortash's Matching Boots - Fix His Clown-Red Faux Pas

State.Author: kharneth
State.Description: Turns Mage Armour inactive instead of removing it when you equip armor, and reactivate it when you unequip armor.
State.Name: Mage Armour - Quality of Life

State.Author: PseudoKociara
State.Description: Three custom horns with glowing variant, plus one extra for body type 1 & 3.
State.Name: Some New Horns

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod expands the natural skintone selection by adding lighter and darker shades to Vanilla skintones, as well as new options. This version includes only natural skintones.
State.Name: Astralities' Skintone Expansion - Natural Tones

State.Author: TumblingLemmings
State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.
State.Name: Better Dual Wielding

State.Author: bloodelf90lvl and genderwithyourmom
State.Description: Makes the trickiest cleric actually tricky!
State.Name: Blessing of the Trickster Buff

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Dynamically scales party portraits on sidebar to allow them fit the screen without scrolling. Up to 16 characters in party supported.
State.Name: Dynamic Sidebar

State.Author: Izzli
State.Description: A collection of 6 autosnapping hairstyles, for all races and body types.
State.Name: Izzli's Snazzy Salon

State.Author: commanderstrawberry
State.Description: Makes females emote less dramatically by editing wrinkle map. Now with some males!
State.Name: Less Wrinkled Expression and Forehead for Face

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Adds a few combinations of vanilla piercings
State.Name: More Piercing Combos

State.Author: Padme4000
State.Description: This mod page is for hosting my mod that so far patches for anything that needs to be added to the races.lsx file as sadly that file is very incompatible with other mods that edit the same sections. So this makes them compatible if I got permission to add them.
State.Name: Patches for CC Mods (Races Hairs Heads Cosmetic and such)

State.Author: Silver
State.Description: Adds 5 new hairstyles to CC
State.Name: Silver's Hair Pack

State.Author: Toarie
State.Description: Collection of hairstyles. Mostly for elf/half-elf/drow/human/tiefling bodytypes 1&2
State.Name: Tav's Hair Salon

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: Align some spells to better match Larian's philosophy regarding duration and concentration.  Includes modules for Vanilla and 5E Spells.
State.Name: Valdacil's Spell Adjustments (Vanilla and 5E Spells)

State.Author: hdtruce
State.Description: Makes Enver Gortash the "handsome younger man with an easy smile" that we daydream about !
State.Name: Gortash Refined

Original.Name: Auto Send Read Books To Camp 2.0.1-7035-2-0-1-1725549135.zip

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically send read books to the camp chest or mark them as wares. Configurable with a JSON file.
State.Name: Auto Send Read Books To Camp

State.Author: Laruses
State.Description: A tiny animation replacement to makes some elves sit up to trance, the way they did in early access.
State.Name: Elves Sit to Trance

State.Author: Dungeons And Souls
State.Description: This page hosts CC Patches for Fantastical Multiverse.  If you're looking for a patch for a beautiful hair or face you'll likely find it here! Give your Tav the makeover they deserve!
State.Name: Fantastical Stylist

State.Author: CilantroRosie
State.Description: A custom head for Elf, Half Elf, Drow, Human,Body1, Aasimar (DarthRen), Gnome. Dwarf removed due to flying eyeballs.
State.Name: Kaitie Head Preset - A Custom head

State.Author: neonbutchery
State.Description: Adds a collection of new hairstyles to the character creator.
State.Name: Neon's Assorted Hairs

State.Author: Poesielibre
State.Description: A small collection of three githyanki head preset for character creation
State.Name: Poesielibre's Githyanki Head Trio

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds a variety of new natural and semi-natural skintones with a wide range of shades to CC.
State.Name: Astralities' Sublime Skintones

State.Author: TumblingLemmings
State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.
State.Name: Better Dual Wielding

State.Author: bububull
State.Description: small collection of random hairstyles for All races and bodytypes
State.Name: Bububull's hair pack 01

State.Author: lumad11
State.Description: Adds eight new heads to the CC for humans, elves, half-elves, drow, teifling and githyanki of body type 1
State.Name: Heads of Plenty

State.Author: Izzli
State.Description: A collection of 6 autosnapping hairstyles, for all races and body types.
State.Name: Izzli's Snazzy Salon

State.Author: lokelaniii
State.Description: 3 heads for body type 1, for Elves, Drow, Half Elves, Humans and Tieflings
State.Name: lokelani's lovely lassies

State.Author: LightningLarryL
State.Description: There are a huge number of quips and comments for your companions in BG3 that only get used if you are playing as them. This mod repurposes all of those lines to be used as companion chatter. All lines play in the correct moment and match the situation. It really makes your party feel more alive!
State.Name: More Reactive Companions

State.Author: Padme4000
State.Description: This mod adds more colours for Tattoos, Lipstick and Makeup
State.Name: P4 Custom Tattoo and Makeup Colours

State.Author: weavebitch
State.Description: Replaces Gortash's boots with a (slightly) less ugly pair. No re-texture, just a modified model.
State.Name: Less Ugly Kicks (Gortash Boots Replacer)

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Niche mod to remove entries from non installed appearance mods from the character creation menu.

 Useful if you have some all in one CC patches for modded races to declutter the menu.
State.Name: CC Cleaner

State.Author: Siael
State.Description: Complete rework of Illithid Powers
State.Name: Illithid Powers Overhaul 2

State.Author: Sparrow
State.Description: Adds eighteen new dragonborn scale colours with bright gold highlights. (Non-replacer.)
State.Name: Sparrow's Gilded Dragonscales (New Dragonborn Scale Colours)

State.Author: Kriana and Yakuzadeso
State.Description: Sure, you can sell Withers your junk, but what if you just need a healing potion?
State.Name: Trade with Withers Add-on - Essential Supplies

State.Author: drkekyll
State.Description: Reworks See Invisibility to reveal invisible creatures without removing their invisibility (no save). Also changes the conditions for losing invisibility to better reflect RAW.
State.Name: (See) Invisibility Rework

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds a variety of new fantastical and unnatural skintones with a wide range of shades to CC.
State.Name: Astralities' Wondrous Skintones

State.Author: Ponsinoumi
State.Description: Changes the initiative die from a D4, to a D20, like the TTRPG.
State.Name: D20 Initiative

State.Author: lumad11
State.Description: Adds eight new heads to the CC for humans, elves, half-elves, drow, teifling and githyanki of body type 1 with fitted piercings. Compatible with EotB and UTav
State.Name: Heads of Plenty Vol. II - A Face Presets Mod

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: Adds some goblin and gith based mashup/undercut hairs for Tav. Works on all characters and body types
State.Name: Jerinski's Alt Hairs

State.Author: JiMarti
State.Description: Make Longstrider from a Target type of spell to an Area type of Spell.
State.Name: Longstrider AOE - Patch 7 Compatible

State.Author: Bluesatin
State.Description: Fixes multiclass characters using the wrong casting-ability when using generic effects like scrolls, illithid powers, items etc.
State.Name: Multiclass Preferred Casting Ability Fix

State.Author: UndefinedScribble
State.Description: Removes the bras from dragonborn underwear.
State.Name: And Hold the Bra - A Dragonborn Underwear Mod

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically use soap post-combat or when entering camp, if available in party member's inventory. Optional soap delivery to camp chest. Configurable via JSON.
State.Name: Auto Use Soap

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: A pack of 10 custom-made hairs. Most are autosnap.
State.Name: Em's Custom Hair Pack 1

State.Author: Dungeons And Souls
State.Description: This page hosts CC Patches for Fantastical Multiverse.  If you're looking for a patch for a beautiful hair or face you'll likely find it here! Give your Tav the makeover they deserve!
State.Name: Fantastical Stylist

State.Author: PseudoKociara
State.Description: Kar'niss head and hair for BT2 elves, halfelves and drows
State.Name: Kar'niss

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Adjusts the amount of lip chewing and grimacing in neutral dialogue
State.Name: Neutral Facial Expressions Tweak

State.Author: Poesielibre
State.Description: This is a small collection of heads I have made for myself, for future playthroughs but have decided to put out there in case someone likes them. This is not a replacer mod, it is a pack for new presets.
State.Name: Poesielibre's Heads

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: Sumradagnoth
State.Description: Implements a RAW faithful version of Reckless Attack for the base Barbarian class (and subclasses).  I got tired of doing half-fixes in my Barbarian subclass mods, so I made this for efficiency and included a full fix for the way BG3 does the ability.
State.Name: 5e Reckless Attack

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes dyeing UI faster and more convenient and dyes more recognizable in inventory.
State.Name: Slightly Better Dyeing (with all dye mods support)

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves cursor text panel - adds damage numbers, damage type icons and warns about replacing concentration spell.
State.Name: Better Cursor Text Panel

State.Author: Hearts
State.Description: fine, no more gatekeeping. 8 new heads for bodytype 1.
State.Name: Hearts' Heads

Original.Name: Heads for the Short Lads - Standard-3695-1-0-8b-1726405022.zip

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: Adds some new standalone heads for masc Gnome, Halfling, and Dwarf. Includes support for Unique Tav.
State.Name: Jerinski's Heads for the Short Lads

State.Author: Tilith
State.Description: Five (+two legacy) versions from easier to realistic and harder with optional files to increase weapon's weight.
State.Name: Pickpocketing Tweaks

State.Author: JuuM
State.Description: Cunning Action is now a passive that changes the resource cost dynamically. Also covers Ranger and Monk.
State.Name: Smart Cunning Action

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Allows you to trade with any NPC you can talk to.
State.Name: Trade With Anyone

State.Author: kassent

State.Name: Native Mod Loader

State.Author: ChaoticNeuThrall
State.Description:
Head pack for Elves/Human/Tiefling.

T1 Body Type.
State.Name: ChaoticNeuThrall Heads

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Speeds up loading by cleaning up database entries left behind by destroyed characters (mostly summons.) Especially impactful in Honour mode.

State.Description: Two new head presets for elven races, humans, and tieflings.

State.Description: Sorts spell lists by level and (localised) name.

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Enables trading with Withers. Optional files add a bunch of items in his inventory and allow you to make your own treasure table.
State.Name: Trade with Withers - Fully modular and customizable treasure tables

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description: Automatically sells items which have no use for their (estimated) sell price, includes most if not all common junk/valuable/decorative/jewelry items, Now (mostly) configurable in game!, Say goodbye to inventory clutter!
State.Name: Auto Loot Seller V3

State.Author: suro
State.Description: Heads for Drow, Elf, Half-Elf, Tiefling, and Human T2/T4. Adds vampire heads to TGAW: Dhampir, including a patch for vampire teeth on other races, and masc reimaginings of Shadowheart and Minthara.
State.Name: Dark Urges - Male T2 and T4 Head Presets -

A bunch of custom presets for body type 1/2/3/4

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes inventories easier to read and organize. Adds new mini-icons, back and foregrounds to distinct useful loot from trash.

State.Description: Increases number of slots on a hotbar's grid and adds one more slot category to main deck. Plus a few minor  QoL improvements.

State.Description: This page hosts CC Patches for Fantastical Multiverse.  If you're looking for a patch for a beautiful hair or face you'll likely find it here! Give your Tav the makeover they deserve!

Original.Name: Norbyte's Baldur's Gate 3 Beta Script Extender-2172-2024April-30-1715333040.7z

State.Author: Norbyte
State.Description: This is the Norbyte's Baldur's Gate 3 Script Extender but the difference is that is Vortex Ready. You just need to downloaded it with Vortex and select "BG3 BG3SE" (this should already be activated by default).
State.Name: Norbyte's Baldur's Gate 3 Script Extender

Original.Name: DC Scaling For Coatings and Arrows-7129-1-0-1709165001.zip

State.Author: BOZNAZ
State.Description: Changes coatings, consumable arrows and throwables(grenades, barrels etc.) to use a difficulty class that scales the same way as most weapon actions do. Basically this will make it more likely for the items to successfully apply their various special effects as you progress through the game.
State.Name: Difficulty Class Scaling For Coatings Arrows And Throwables

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Provides an in-game graphical interface that allows players to intuitively manage mod settings and custom mod widgets.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

Original.Name: Spells Enhanced - Speak with Animals - B-995-3-1-0-1696018035.zip

State.Author: MaskedrPGFan
State.Description: Speak with Animals Enhanced. For all allies in 18 m radius range. Permanent passive toggle. New passive. Different variants.
State.Name: Spells Enhanced - Speak with Animals

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes inventories easier to read and organize. Adds new mini-icons, back and foregrounds to distinct useful loot from trash.
State.Name: Better Inventory UI (with Mark Books as Read support)

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: A pack of 5 hair mashups combining vanilla hairs. For all fem body types plus human/elf/tiefling/drow masc body types.
State.Name: Em's Hair Mashups Pack 1

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new, glowing eye colors to CC, inspired by the Feywild and folklore.
State.Name: Feywild Eyes - Eye Color Collection

State.Author: xmas214
State.Description: Ever unintentionally break a Paladin oath / keep pissing off Karlach / repeatedly pick the hardest skill checks / say something Gale took as a pick-up line?  OIO is here for you.
State.Name: OIO - Overexplained Interaction Options

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds 4 styles of animal ears to the Horn slot, for all Races except Dragonborn.
State.Name: Astralities Fluffy Ears

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library is designed to be a set of common data that any mod may draw from. This includes Scripts, Spells, Statuses, Passives, etc.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library

State.Author: PseudoKociara
State.Description: Second Part. Presets for elves, drows and halfelves for now. Mainly for BT2, but I included couple of presets for BT 1 & 4
State.Name: New CC Head Presets Vol. 2

State.Author: cedastarions
State.Description: Male head presets for elves & drow.
State.Name: PRETTY BOYS by cedastarions

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new, glowing eye colors to CC, inspired by Tieflings and demonic themes.
State.Name: Demon Eyes - Eye Color Collection

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Another pack of 5 hair mashups combining vanilla hairs. For all body types.
State.Name: Em's Hair Mashups Pack 2

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Make read books green, also appends a configurable prefix & suffix to read books (similar books will automatically be marked as read afterward)

Based mod, I know.
State.Name: Mark books as read

State.Author: Eumeta
State.Description:
Delete clutter items from trader inventory after you close the trading option so when you mass-sell useless items they no longer overwhelm the trading menu.

Eldritch Tablets ? Gone

Spoons ? Gone

Skulls ? Gone

You want to add more items to the removal list ? They're gone too.
State.Name: Trader Clutter Begone

Original.Name: Yet Another Script Extender Configuration Option 2-7283-1-0-1709142066.zip

State.Author: Norbyte
State.Description: These are simple configurations for Script Extender, which basically is where you have the Achievements or/and Console enabled, since those are the most requested settings.
State.Name: Yet Another Script Extender Configuration

State.Author: Cephelos
State.Description: In the vanilla game, effects that increase your carry weight do not stack. With this mod, they will.
State.Name: Stacking Carry Weight

State.Author: Tripsadin
State.Description: Included in this .pak modfile is my materials, textures, a localisation file and models to -add- to the BG3 Character Creation Piercing list. Piercings in Silver, Black and Gold! Also some eye stuff. Works on all races and bodytypes and genders EXCEPT Dragonborn and Half-Orc (due to thick lips). The eyewear can clip in to the cheeks.
State.Name: Trips' Accessory Collection

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Full collection of my map improvements - minimap widget scaling, no grid/shroud on the map, new better NPC markers and more.
State.Name: Better Maps All-In-One

State.Author: Sailor Cat
State.Description: Summon won't end its turn? Forcibly end the current turn or combat with these Script Extender console commands.
State.Name: Combat Console Commands

State.Author: Rob Lapham
State.Description: Varies character heights by race to be more accurate with D&D source material instead of one size fits all.
State.Name: Racial Height Variation

State.Author: pooteeweet
State.Description:
Change Gortash's head, teeth and/or hair. Loose files or .pak.  

Uses Vemperen﻿ and Dufresne12's Male Human G1 head.
State.Name: Gortash Facelift

State.Author: Toarie
State.Description: New presets for character creation.
State.Name: New Character Creation Presets WIP

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes split item menu more responsive and adds min/max button.
State.Name: Slightly Better Split Item Menu
